title: Whole Grains: A Love Story | Roxana Jullapat
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • Get the book! Mother Grains: Recipes for the Grain Revolution by Roxana Jullapat

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit: 

  • Banoffee Tart With Rice Shortbread Crust (Food52 recipe)
  • Peach Cobbler With Brown Rice Drop Biscuits (Food52 recipe)
  • Follow Roxana on  Instagram

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Roxana Jullapat)

itunes:title: Whole Grains: A Love Story | Roxana Jullapat
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Roxana Jullapat
itunes:summary: Owner and head baker of Friends & Family and author of 'Mother Grains', Roxana Jullapat joins us to tell the story of how she developed a love of using whole grains in her baking and even shares some tips on practicing 'Anti-Valentine's Day'.
itunes:subtitle: Owner and head baker of Friends & Family and author of 'Mother Grains', Roxana Jullapat joins us to tell the story of how she developed a love of using whole grains in her baking and even shares some tips on practicing 'Anti-Valentine's Day'.
